meanings.definition: Enlisted or hired for a job or task.
meanings.sent1: The recruited team members were excited to start their new project.
meanings.sent2: The company hired recruited employees to help with the busy season.
meanings.sent3: The recruited workers had a party to celebrate their new roles.
meanings.sent4: The recruited team was like a well-oiled machine, working seamlessly together.
meanings.sent5: The recruited candidates stood out with their impressive skills during the interview.

meanings.definition: Persuaded to join a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: She recruited her friends to join the book club.
meanings.sent2: The army recruited new soldiers to strengthen their forces.
meanings.sent3: The cat recruited the dog to help catch the mouse in the house.
meanings.sent4: The idea recruited supporters from all walks of life.
meanings.sent5: The coach recruited talented players for the upcoming tournament.
